pages.text: Things are starting to get a bit more weird . I met a $(4)legendary creature$() : $(9)Warden$() when I was mining.

pages.title: Sculk Pearl
pages.text: Fortunately , I sent him to see Jesus with my smart brain , I found a bag from him taht has a $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/sculk_pearl)smooth pearl$() inside . I don't know what it does.Forget it , I should have a good sleep now.
